msg: Changed center code which was hiding the errors in leftPad and rightPad

author: bayard
msg: Fixed bugs in leftPad and rightPad which basically made them not work.

author: bayard
msg: Added comment to the point that the start argument is include, and the
end argument is exclusive. Need to decide if the method is really
useful at all to more than just myself.

author: bayard
msg: Some documentation added to the slice method and a missing, all-important
end-- added in. Previous versions will only slice off the end of a
collection and will not obey the slice() value. Error pointed out
